uuid.description: The unique identifier of the event.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, an event.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the post to use in its canonical URL.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the post.

mediumDescription.description: The medium description of the post.

longDescription.description: The long desciption of the post.

media.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

tags.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

categories.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this event.

author.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this event.

program.description: The series or event that is the parent program of this season.

blurb.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this event.

published.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the event has been published.

availableDate.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

datePublished.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.
